products.name: [Tonymoly] I'm REAL Sheet Mask (10 types)
products.detailed_description:
Description

Replenish your skin with our I'm Real Sheet Mask Collection! Available in an array of ingredients, the 3-layer pulp sheet is filled with natural ingredients and soaked in different types of enriched essence (Water-type, Micro-Emulsion Type, Milky Lotion Type) to yield maximum hydration for your skin. Transform dull and tired skin into healthy, moisturized skin in as little as 20 minutes!

Aloe - Moisturizing
Avocado - Nutrition
Pomegranate-Elasticity

Lemon - Brightening
Makgeoli - Skin Purifying (Korean Rice Wine)
Red Wine - Pore Care
Rice - Clear Skin
Seaweeds - Skin Purifying
Tea Tree - Skin Soothing


Size: 21ml

products.name: [COSRX] Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser 150ml
products.detailed_description:
Description
Gentle gel type cleanser with mildly acidic pH level
While refining the skin texture, the cleanser will help cleanse with no stripping. Great for all skin types, wake up to a firmer-looking skin while letting it rest clean during the night. 
 - Cleanse daily with this gentle and effective gel type cleanser day and night, removing impurities while strengthening your skin barrier.- While refining the skin texture, the cleanser will help cleanse with no stripping. - Great for all skin types, wake up to a firmer-looking skin while letting it rest clean during the night.- Cleanser is pH balanced, and uses tea-tree oil and BHA to soothe and strengthen for luminous and clear skin.

products.name: [COSRX] Advanced Snail 92 All In One Cream 100ml
products.detailed_description:
Description
Moisturizer enriched with 92% of snail mucin to give skin nourishment 

An all-in-one solution cream that repairs and soothes irritated, sensitized skin after breakouts. A rich gel-type cream absorbs instantly into the skin with a full of nourishment while leaving your skin feeling fresh and comfortable.- Snail Mucin 92%: Infused with 92% of snail mucin, this cream glides onto the skin and builds a moisture barrier to plump, hydrate and soothe skin. - Repair, Recover, Rebuild!: An all-in-one solution cream that repairs and soothes irritated, sensitized skin after breakouts. - Light-weight, Non-greasy: A rich gel-type cream absorbs instantly into the skin with a full of nourishment while leaving your skin feeling fresh and comfortable.- No harm to the Snails! The snails are placed over a mesh in a dark and quiet room, where they are left alone to freely roam the net and leave mucin in their trails. - There is no external process applied or the mesh to force mucin production. 

 BENEFITS
• Nourishes & plumps• Anti-aging• Repairs damaged skin• Long lasting hydration
TARGETS
• Red, irritated skin• Dull & rough skin• Dark spots & scars• Dehydrated skin
Size : 100g (3.52 oz)

products.name: [SKIN1004] Madagascar Centella Ampoule 55ml
products.detailed_description:
Description
- Repairs damaged skin while regulating its water-oil balance.- Infused with Centella Asiatica extract from Madagascar to moisturize, soothe and strengthen skin barrier for healthier-looking skin.- Suitable for all skin types.- Penetrates deep within skin for a more moisturized complexion.- SKIN 1004 Madagascar Centella Asiatica 100 Ampoule is a real healing ampoule containing natural ingredients to strengthen skin barrier, repair damaged skin and balance out oil and water of the skin.- Formulated with naturally-derived Centella Asiatica extract to strengthen the skin barrier without causing irritation.- Regulates your skin’s moisture and oil balance.Soothing Ampoule for sensetive skin made with 100% Madagascan Centella Asiatica Extract
Consisting the single most effective ingredient and nothing else to ensure maximized benefits, this ampoule only contains Centella Asiatica Extract. 
Texture: Natural Centella Asiatica extract with watery texture deeply penetrates the skin to keep it hydrated without stickness.

products.name: [Anua] Niacinamide 10% + TXA 4% Serum 30ml
products.detailed_description:
Description

A watery serum enriched with 10% Niacinamide and 4% Tranexamic Acid to target at stubborn dark spots and hyperpigmentation by helping to reduce discoloration.
Infused with 2% Arbutin to help correct uneven skin tone by limiting Melanin production.
A lightweight texture without stickiness.
